name: search_files
description: Search the local file index for documents matching a natural language query.

natural_query.description: Natural language description of the files to locate.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 10).

name: run_command
description: Execute a trusted local automation command (launch apps, control windows, manage audio).

command.description: Spoken-style command such as 'open discord' or 'take screenshot'.

name: build_file_index
description: Scan allowed folders and refresh the on-disk file index.

extra_paths.description: Optional additional folders to include in the scan.

max_file_size_mb.description: Skip files larger than this size in megabytes (default 50).

name: search_memory
description: Look up stored facts or history entries that mention a given topic.

query.description: Keyword to match within memory facts and history.

name: window_control
description: Control and switch between windows and apps on Windows. Use this for commands like 'minimize this window', 'switch to Discord', or 'launch Steam'.

target_app.description: Optional app label such as 'discord' or 'steam'.

monitor.description: Optional monitor hint such as 'left', 'right', 'primary', or 'monitor 2'.

name: voice_typing_control
description: Enable or disable dictation mode and optionally type text into the active window via pyautogui.
